page.title: 18Wembley Stadium
page.content:
It was built originally for the Olympics in 1924,and there is now talk about using it for the 1992 Olympics.
It is best known for holding football matches,like the FA.Cup Final and the Milk Cup,but many other sporting events take place there.Rugby League, Hurling and Hockey all have important matches there.Sometimes they have pop concerts,like the recent {"Live Aid"}concert which raised money for charity,and religious meetings and there is weekly greyhound racing.
There is a big market held in the car park every Sunday.
It is very close to the{Wembley {Arena, Wembley Conference Centre}and a hotel.
